member.name: M:Penguin.Json.JsonPopulatedPropertiesObject.Penguin#Json#Abstractions#Interfaces#IJsonPopulatedPropertiesObject#GetProperty(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of a requested property, first from the hard-coded properties and then from the backing JSON
member.param: The name of the property to retrieve
member.returns: The current value of the property
